synopsis.text: Serizawa Kaho, the most admired girl in school, is the object of Makimura Koutarou's affection. As the summer vacation approaches, Koutarou decides to express his feelings to Kaho. However, his plans take an unexpected turn when he encounters a mysterious girl who inadvertently propels him into the future. In this future, Koutarou discovers that Kaho has become his girlfriend, but tragically, she has met with an untimely death. With the help of the mysterious girl, who is revealed to be a time patroller named Ligene, Koutarou embarks on a mission to alter the course of time and save Kaho from her impending fate. As he navigates through time, Koutarou's extraordinary summer vacation unfolds, filled with love, loss, and the relentless pursuit to change destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
